description: When makeup base or foundation does not blend well with the skin, resulting in a powdery appearance.

examples.chinese: 粉霜贼拉细腻,上脸真的看不出一点粉感
examples.translation: The cream foundation is incredibly fine, you really can't see any cakey look on the face.

examples.chinese: 定妆喷雾按了一层以后妆面太持久还可以降低粉感
examples.translation: Spraying a layer of setting spray can make the makeup last longer and reduce the powdery look.

examples.chinese: 超级好用的散粉,不是明显粉感,和肌肤融合的非常自然
examples.translation: Super easy-to-use loose powder, not obviously powdery, blends very naturally with the skin.
